title: GAME CRASHES
body: So everytime I even re down load the game I get random crashes even when I tried to fix it with updates when you first log in , It doesnt work now you guys put me on low elo which it isnt my fault when i try my best tor re log in every single time and its not fair that this is happening to me.

replies.body: When you say crash, what exactly is happening?  Are there any error messages?  We can't remove lower priority queues set by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) or change game stats, but I'd like to help troubleshoot.  Let me know!
